name: Fantasy Mosaics 17: New Palette
description: The penguin family are thrilled to discover a new palette of colors for mosaic puzzles! They are happy to meet a mysterious lady penguin on an alien planet who helps open their mind to a great variety of colors. Along the way they keep exploring the alien world and build a beautiful landscape!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP,Vista,7,8,10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 110 MB available space
